description.original: Transform the Page Preview hover popover into a fully working editor instance
description.translation: Transform the Page Preview hover popover into a fully working editor instance

dict..setDesc(\"Allow hover preview to trigge: .setDesc("Allow hover preview to trigger when hovering over any type of rendered embed such as images or block references")
dict..setDesc(\"Set the hover editor as the a: .setDesc("Set the hover editor as the active pane when opened")
dict..setDesc(\"When double clicking to minim: .setDesc("When double clicking to minimize, the window will roll down instead of rolling up")
dict..setDesc(`Show the view header by defaul:
.setDesc(`Show the view header by default when triggering a hover editor.
         When disabled, view headers will only show if you click the view header icon to the left of the minimize button.`)
dict..setDesc(`Click and hold an image within:
.setDesc(`Click and hold an image within a hover editor to temporarily maximize the popover and image to fill the entire viewport. 
        On mouse up, the hover editor will restore to its original size.`)
dict..setDesc(\"How long to wait before showi: .setDesc("How long to wait before showing a Hover Editor when hovering over a link")
dict..setDesc(\"How long to wait before closi: .setDesc("How long to wait before closing a Hover Editor once the mouse leaves")
dict..textContent=`${a} is not yet created. C: .textContent=`${a} is not yet created. Click to create.`
